title: What are the benefits of being a member of the GSE Profession?

content.text: To support you in your career, the GSE profession has a range of resources available to members. These can be found in the GSE profession’s employee value proposition (EVP) document.
These resources have been produced and collected to provide you with all the information you need to help you perform at your best. These resources cover:

An EVP is the unique set of benefits that an employee receives in return for the skills, capabilities, and experience they bring to a company, or in this case, to the profession. A strong EVP will help ensure the civil service is able to attract and retain the best science & engineering talent to ensure decision marking in government is as thorough as possible.
Some of the offers outlined include:

The GSE profession’s EVP successfully communicates all the profession’s initiatives, products, and services available to members. There are links that signpost members to the each and every GSE offer, with plans to update the document in line with updates. If you would like to access the offers outlined in the EVP you can join the GSE Profession here.
